tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
title_narrative: Protecting Civilians through Humanitarian Mine Action in Syria
Proteggere i civili attraverso l'azione contro le mine in Siria
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Immediate and long-term impact of explosive hazards (EH) on civilians and humanitarian operations in Syria is reduced to promote peaceful and inclusive communities for sustainable development (SDG 3 and 16). This pilot project aims at surveilling and clear from explosive hazards eight locations in Syria, seven in rural Damascus and one in Homs, that are deemed to be highly contaminated.

L’intervento mira a ridurre l'impatto immediato e a lungo termine sui civili e sulle operazioni di assistenza umanitaria in Siria, originato dalla presenza di ordigni esplosivi (Explosive Hazards), al fine di promuovere comunità pacifiche e inclusive per lo sviluppo sostenibile (SDG 16 e 3). In particolare l’intervento è un progetto pilota che mira a favorire lo sminamento in un totale di otto aree della Siria (sette nelle zone rurali di Damasco e una a Homs), che riportano alti livelli di contaminazione da parte di ordigni esplosivi.
